1.0.0.name: drupal/security_experimental

security-coverage.message: Covered by Drupal's security advisory policy

1.0.0.description:
Harden the security of your Drupal install with these advanced security tricks.  
Note: This module contains some of the most cutting edge security enhancements available.  
It is possible that not all features will work with your Drupal install.  
Always test security changes to make sure they don't break existing functionality.

dev-1.x.name: drupal/security_experimental

security-coverage.message: Dev releases are not covered by Drupal security advisories.
